articles.author: Simon Smale
articles.title: Australian curlers qualify for Beijing Winter Olympic Games for first time - ABC News
articles.description: Australian pair Dean Hewitt and Tahli Gill will be Australia's first Winter Olympic curlers after winning the mixed pairs qualification tournament in The Netherlands.
articles.content:
Australia will have representation in curling at the Winter Olympics for the very first time in Beijing.
Key points:
